message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and worth every penny. Considering its value, I propose a price of $16,000 for it. This offer is exclusive to you and comes with a special warranty package. Let me know if you're interested!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. It's a fair price considering the value to me, and I'm hoping we can find common ground.

I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Given the high value you place on this product, I am willing to consider $15,000 as a final offer. This includes all the features you're looking for and ensures you get the best possible deal. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations.
